The handicap system was changed for the 2023 season to use a new formula from Archery GB. Prior to this, tables created by David Lane were used. Use this toggle to switch between the two systems.

Export will create a backup of the database in the phone\'s downloads folder. Importing will restore the database from a backup in the phone\'s downloads folder, overwriting all existing data. Importing will also cause the app to restart. Note: import and export do not include app settings.
Deletes all data from the database. Note: this does not include app settings.
